narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Yedei Chesed INC is a Respite Care, Respite Care, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities, Child provider based in Chestnut Ridge, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $25.5M in Medicaid payments across 69K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $25.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
